description: Failed to parse JSON response from network. Data format mismatch or corrupted response.
commonCauses: HTML error page returned as JSON
solutions: Use lenient JSON parsing for flexibility
prevention: Use strong typing with data classes
examples: try { val data = gson.fromJson(json, MyData::class.java) } catch (e: JsonSyntaxException) { Log.e(TAG, "Invalid JSON: $json"); showParseError() }
// Retrofit auto-handles: @GET("/data") suspend fun getData(): Response<MyData>
